title: Bug 114903: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: When previewing the report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the value boxes in the Enter Parameters dialog are empty.
EB: When previewing the report and clicking the Show Report Parameters button, the default values should be shown in the value boxes in the Enter Parameters dialog, so that I can modify the parameters that I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create several report parameters.
2. Set default values for the report parameters.
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout.
